blocks.title: Why Attend FARMINAR?
blocks.content: Best oppurtunity to get knowledge and information from the agricultural experts and also successful farmers.

blocks.title: Join the Meeting
blocks.content: All you have to do is register for yourself and listen to the experts while sitting at your farm or at home.

blocks.title: Upgrade Your Farming
blocks.content: There will be always something to learn and upgrade our knowledge.
